msg.conditionUtilisation:
All calculations must be confirmed before use. This tool applies theoretical calculations and can not replace the user experience or knowledge of the treatment plan and program information should be interpreted with caution. This tool is not a substitute for clinical judgment!
In case of direct or indirect damages resulting from the use (or inability to use) Webdia, neither the author nor the HUG can not be held responsible.
msg.erreurInstallationWebdia:
Your configuration does not allow WEBDIA to save necessary information to your smartphone !

WEBDIA cannot work if your browser is in private mode!

To avoid these problems, please add the shortcut to WEBDIA to your homescreen !

msg.conditionUtilisation7:
Disclaimer

By using Webdia, you declare that you have read and understood the terms of use mentioned below.
msg.conditionUtilisation8:
Responsibility

All calculations need to be confirmed by the user. This software applies theoretical calculations and cannot replace the users experience or knowledge of the treatment scheme. Therefore, the suggestions made by the program need to be interpreted cautiously and do not replace the users clinical judgment. In case of direct or indirect damage resulting from the use (or inability to use) Webdia, neither the author, nor the University Hospital of Geneva can be made responsible.
msg.conditionUtilisation9:
Data protection

Proper functioning of Webdia depends on data exchange between the mobile device and an external server. This server is located in Switzerland. Data transmission between mobile devices and the server occurs anonymously and in a secured manner. Nonetheless, the author and the University Hospital of Geneva take no responsibility concerning the security of the transmitted data. The costs related to the use of internet connections for data exchange are borne by the user.

Please do not hesitate to contact us.
